meanings.definition: The branch of biology that deals with the relationship between organisms and their environments.
meanings.sent1: Ecophysiology helps us understand how animals interact with nature.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use ecophysiology to learn how plants survive in different climates.
meanings.sent3: The ecophysiology of squirrels explains why they love acorns so much.
meanings.sent4: Her research shed light on the ecophysiology of fish in polluted waters.
meanings.sent5: Learning about ecophysiology is like discovering the secret language of nature.

meanings.definition: The study of how living organisms adapt to their environment.
meanings.sent1: Understanding ecophysiology is crucial for protecting endangered species.
meanings.sent2: Ecophysiology shows us how animals change to live in extreme conditions.
meanings.sent3: The ecophysiology of penguins wearing sunglasses would be fascinating.
meanings.sent4: In the jungle of city life, humans display their own form of ecophysiology.
meanings.sent5: The book on ecophysiology made the complex topic easy to grasp.
